name: Rate of injury and illness cases per 100 full-time workers for Credit intermediation and related activities, Private industry, All U.S.
description: Measure: Rate of injury and illness cases per 100 full-time workers; Case type: Cases involving days away from work, job restriction, or transfer; Industry: Credit intermediation and related activities; Supersector: Financial activities; Area: Private industry, All U.S.; Not Seasonally Adjusted; Source: BLS Injuries, Illnesses and Fatalities (IIF) program. For more information see http://www.bls.gov/iif/oshover.htm.
